svg.text: 10%: We distribute 10 free claim opportunities to early fools from our community.
20%: Our first global event will take place in Metaverse
31.4159%: We will launch a virtual event where we will talk about NFTs
We collaborate with Louis Vutton on an EXCLUSIVE merch drop
We collaborate with Marvel on an EXCLUSIVE merch drop
We collaborate with Marvel on an EXCLUSIVE merch drop
We buy a plot of land in the Metaverse
